verbose_text: Additionally, CRA increased the transcription of alpha-MHC, and inhibited the transcription of hypertrophic markers (ANP, BNP, and beta-MHC) and fibrotic markers (CTGF, Collagen Ialpha, Collagen IIIalpha and FN) at 4 weeks after MI, as compared with the untreated MI group (XREF_FIG).
